assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: AHB has received compensation as a section editor for the Journal of Genetic Counseling and holds an equity stake in MeTree and You, Inc. WRU receives book royalties from Wiley-Blackwell. MES has received compensation as a section editor for the Journal of Genetic Counseling. Remaining authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Stanford IRB reviewed this study as exempt, and all aspects adhered to the principles in the Declaration of Helsinki. All participants reviewed an informed consent document before choosing to participate in this study.
